text: @realDonaldTrump You earned it, wear it. Down in the polls, can’t draw a crowd for your rally. Eight staff members already COVID-19 positive. Any idiot knows better. One term, impeached President. You deserve everything that comes at you. Don’t like it?  Resign.

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
